description:
Palmolive Odour Neutralising Lime Antibacterial Liquid Hand Wash Soap is 95% natural origin and made with skin-loving ingredients and a naturally derived antibacterial agent, for healthy, beautiful hands. Contains 0% parabens, phthalates & alcohol.

Made with 100% natural lime oil and a naturally derived antibacterial agent, Palmolive Antibacterial Liquid Hand Wash Lime kills 99.9% of germs, andÂ is clinically proven to provide long lasting antibacterial protection.

Freshen up your day with this zingy cleanser with notes of Lime and Citrus.

What we leave out is as important as what we put in
- No parabens.
- No phthalates.
- No mineral oil.
- No alcohol.
- No silicones.
- No soap.
- No gluten.
- No BPA.
- No animal derived ingredients.

Refill & save - enough for 4 x 250ml pumps.

Please recycle! This bottle is recyclable. Made with 65% less plastic, it's better for your wallet and better for the planet.

Use in the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

ANTIBACTERIAL HAND WASH: Palmolive Antibacterial Liquid Hand Wash Odour Neutralising Lime is 95% natural origin and kills 99.9% of germs with a naturally derived antibacterial agent and natural lime oil

FRESHEN UP YOUR DAY: with this zingy cleanser with notes of Lime and Citrus.

FREE FROM: Parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, alcohol, silicones, soap, gluten, BPA, and animal derived ingredients

RECYCLABLE: Our Palmolive Liquid Hand Wash Soap bottle is made with 65 percent less plastic and is a recyclable bottle

REFILL AND SAVE: with our 1L Palmolive Liquid Hand Wash enough for 4 x 250mL pumps.
name: Palmolive Antibacterial Liquid Hand Wash Soap Lime Refill 1L
